page.title: 07THE UPWEY SOCIETY
page.content: THIS ORGANIZATION,FOUNDED IN 1979,WAS SET UP TO{STOP UPWEY BECOMING TOO} {COMMERCIALISED. } A SOCIETY MEMBER,MR.BEATON,TOLD US THAT HE HAS SEEN LITTLE CHANGE IN THE VILLAGE IN MANY YEARS.THE CHURCH AND THE WISHING WELL HAVE NOT CHANGED BUT A MAJOR DEVELOPMENT DID COME ABOUT WHEN THE VILLAGE WAS CONNECTED TO THE MAINS SEWAGE SYSTEM. A BIG BLOW CAME WHEN THE LOCAL SCHOOL CLOSED FOLLOWED BY THE SWEET SHOP AND POST OFFICE SEVERAL YEARS AGO.GENERALLY IT IS THOUGHT THAT MOST OF THE CHANGES HAVE IN FACT BEEN FOR THE BETTER{-"AFTER ALL NO MAJOR } {BUILDINGS HAVE ACTUALLY BEEN PULLED} {DOWN".} THE SOCIETY HOLDS MANY FUND RAISING ACTIVITIES WITH THE PROFITS BEING USED FOR GOOD CAUSES WITHIN THE VILLAGE AND OUTSIDE.
